description.@en: A perfect throw can bring down your quarry as they run away. With a carefully-placed shot, you can disarm or knock down any foe.

effect.@en: At Distance, you can substitute either your Simple Ranged or Martial Ranged Skills when you attempt to use Disarm, Stunning Blow or Takedown. Note that you do not inflict Damage when you attempt such maneuvers. You must be armed with a loaded ranged weapon in order to Take ‘Em Down.
